item.title: [PI] Making timers?
item.dc:creator: @Darkmist Darkmist
item.description:
@Darkmist wrote:

Ok new problem, Everything compiled fine, No errors
BUT, What im trying to do is make an object spawn on the timer… so here’s my code

if (c.ObjectTimer == 120) { c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(75, 3306, 9197, 0, 10); } c.sendMessage("Hide and seek has begun!!");

How do i make it spawn? cos i waited in game for 2 minutes and it never came up lol
